dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Now, we will proceed to review the contract with mutual attendance of both parties. Let's not do anything stupid and waste each other's time, yeah?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Quit naggin' me... it's only the morn. I've got five different contract attendances lined up today, so let me rest the morning away at least.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Next.. we will review... Please, as a participating intermediary, I cannot permit the attendees to consume food in the middle of a contract write-up. Get somethin' to eat later.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: You there, wake up. We haven't even gone over the most important clauses yet. Yeah, yeah. I want to head home as much as you do, so cooperate. Yeah?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: The Öufi's primary field is mediating and observing contracts. If any poor sod refuses to carry out the terms, or obstructs the contract fulfillment... hmph, then we'll be forced to make them comply.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Can't say I enjoy this overly posh, uncomfortable clothing, but... these apparently represent the authority of the executors of a contract, or something along those lines.
Well, since I can't be caught out of uniform... I suppose I'll have to get used to it. And it *is* quite posh.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Weapons of the Öufi specialize in amputation. It is an important part of our job to execute those that have failed to carry out the contract, or those who have broken any relevant regulations. Or so they say.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Well... I suppose it is what it is. You should have submitted a formal complaint instead of screamin' and throwin' a tantrum before everyone else during the contract. That's obstruction.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
A contract overseen by the Öufi, no matter the conditions, must be fulfilled. It cannot, and should not, fall through.
...Even if it means that there must be blood.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... Total silence may also count under negligence to properly review the contract. Say something.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: That was your final warning. Now, as obstruction of contract execution has been observed, I am compelled to... beat the shite out of you all!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Another broken contract, eh?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I am in attendance.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: An unauthorized involvement of a third party is also prohibited.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I told you to watch yourself!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: You better start listening now.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Now that's one less obstacle in our way.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: You can kill me... but the Öufi will ensure that... the contract is executed to its full extent..

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: As stipulated in the contract.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... Did I misunderstand the terms of the contract?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: The consequences for an obstruction of contract execution will be carried out no matter what. There will be another from the Öufi... so look forward to it, hmph.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Attendance completed. Since the contract's been carried out to the letter... there ain't much else for me to do here!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Another contract fell through. Haah... this doesn't even get reflected in the performance reviews. Tsk, I suppose I should move on to the next case soon.
